settings.description:
Our founder Stephen Condon, started growing his beard out long before the beard craze and noticed his beard was thicker than average and it was such a pain to grow and especially manage. First with the dreaded ‚Äúbeard itch‚Äù, to the actual beard drying out it was time to make a move. Having a degree in marketing and branding, In 2013 Stephen saw the lightbulb and realized this was the perfect opportunity to jump ahead of the men‚Äôs grooming product industry and start formulating Bossman products. After perfecting the perfect beard-care line, Stephen found formulating products for men was a true passion and started designing products for everything a real Bossman may need. Not only beard, Bossman has an array of top-notch products that tackle every inch of the body from beard to body. This full line varies from beard care, to skin care, to hair care.


INNOVATION

Bossman products aren‚Äôt your run of the mill cookie-cutter grooming products. Stephen makes sure every product is an innovative product that one-ups any competition or just a product no one has ever thought about making. Products such as ‚ÄúJelly Beard Oil‚Äù, Colotion Aromatic Lotion, to a Cooling Caffeinated After-Shave, Bossman products are original as they come with a specific purpose.


TOP-NOTCH INGREDIENTS

Bossman products are not ‚Äúhome-brewed‚Äù in some unregulated basement or random facility. All ingredients are responsibly sourced, formulated in an authorized lab, and manufactured in a 100% fully licensed facility to ensure the best quality for our customers.


CUSTOMER FIRST

We always put our customers first, which is why if you ever decide you dislike a product, we will refund your money, no questions asked. We just believe that‚Äôs the way business should be done.

settings.title: Shop by Scent
settings.content: Bossman is world-renowned for our face smells. Our face and hair smells are so tight. You‚Äôll feel like a king. Browse below or use our selector to help decide which is right for you.

settings.scent_content: Warm blend of rich Sandalwood and Vanilla oils highlight bergamot, patchouli and frankincense accents. This original scent is perfect  for close encounters, special occasions, and days when your beard needs to be as smooth as you are.

settings.scent_thumb:
Fine leather / Sweet tobacco
Aged bourbon
settings.scent_content: This Texas-sized blend of rugged leather, sweet tobacco, and aged Bourbon will make your beard look and smell like a gentleman as you belly up to any saloon. Saddle not required.

settings.scent_thumb:
Lemon / Lavender / Bergamot
Cedarwood / Spruce Vetiver
Rosemary / Saffron / Sandalwood
settings.scent_content: Fresh mix of woods such as Cedar, Spruce, Sandalwood with a hint of Lemon, Bergamot, Lavender, and Saffron Spice gives a clean and invigorating effect. It‚Äôs the perfect way to wake up or just feel refreshed throughout your day.
Every man's scent that just doesn't quit. Geranium and lavender are masterfully mixed with vanilla and patchouli to bring you a strong mechanical smell for the do-it-yourself kind of man.
No scent required. For the man who wants to sport his own natural scent or favorite cologne with no other scent competing for attention.

Designed for a king, Royal Oud‚Äôs Cedarwood and Bergamot undertones are complemented with hints of lemon, clove, and pepper oils. This scent is for the Boss who garners attention from all of those around him based on not only his devilishly good looks, but his attitude and accolades as well.

Vetiver X: If you work hard and play hard, then Vetiver X is the scent companion you're looking for when getting cleaned up. Its carefully curated blend of bergamot, vanilla, and frankincense oils are the perfect complement to the freshness provided by vetiver and cedarwood oils. If you want to leave an impression, Vetiver X will amplify your stature.
